lists.list-names: function(head, req) { var names = { 'names' : [], 'query' : req.query }; while(row = getRow()) { names.names.push(row.value.name) }; send(toJSON(names)); }

updates.update-request: function(doc, req) { if (!doc) { return [{ '_id' : req.uuid, 'name' : 'ten', 'req' : req } , {'json': {'status' : 'ok'}}] } else { doc.req = req; return [doc, {'json': {'status': 'ok'}}];}}
